npgsql fbsql
select distinct cd_id as id, val as value, cd_vrsn_tbl.mnemonic from cd_set_mem_assoc_tbl inner join cd_vrsn_tbl using (cd_id) left join cd_name_tbl using (cd_id) where obslt_vrsn_seq_id is null and obslt_utc is null and sts_cd_id = 'c8064cbd-fa06-4530-b430-1a52f1530c27' and lang_cs = COALESCE(${Context_Language}, 'en') and set_id = 'f4045af6-5295-482f-bab3-c5f2c3738703' order by cd_vrsn_tbl.mnemonic

sqlite
select concept.uuid as id, value from concept_concept_set inner join concept on (concept.uuid = concept_concept_set.concept_uuid) left join concept_name on (concept.uuid = concept_name.concept_uuid) where language = COALESCE(${Context.Language}, 'en') and concept_concept_set.concept_set_uuid = X'F65A04F495522F48BAB3C5F2C3738703' order by concept.mnemonic
